title: AI Tools Explorer
description: A web application built with React to discover and explore the best AI tools available. Features a dynamic and responsive interface.

title: OTT Subscription Manager
description: A full-stack application to help users save money by managing their OTT platform subscriptions. Includes a Node.js backend.

title: Republic of Novara
description: A conceptual government website portfolio piece with a focus on clean UI/UX and accessibility. Built with static HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: PPT generator using API
description: A web application that generates PowerPoint presentations from user-provided content using a REST API.

title: Advanced Interactive Piano
